resources.string: No payments done by any user yet
The System theme allows the application to change the application theme according to the system selected theme.

Helping Hand is an Android based application which is used for the online Charity Donations and to help people by contributing your valuable time to those flourishing NGOs which is always ready for the development of good fortune and successful social status of our Nation.

Block App Notifications allows a user to block the notifications coming from the app to the phone\'s notification drawer.\n\nApplying this will stop showing the notification and the user may not get any notification regarding the application.
